content: प्रकोष्ठः {@--1@} The fore-arm, the part above the wrist; वामप्रकोष्ठार्पितहेमवेत्रः <ls>Ku. 3. 41</ls>; कनकवलयभ्रंशरिक्तप्रकोष्ठः <ls>Me. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 59</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 6.</ls> {@--2@} The room near the gate of a palace; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--3@} A court in a house, a quadrangle or square (surrounded by buildings); इमं प्रथमं प्रकोष्ठ प्रविशत्वार्यः &c. <ls>Mk. 4.</ls> {@--4@} A part of a door-frame.
